column2:
mydata <- mydata %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("f"), 
               names_to = "func", 
               values_to = "pedagogy")

# renaming two variables in funct column and getting rid of old func column
fun <- c(fsqueak = "squeak", flight = "light")

mydata$funct <- 
  as.character(fun[mydata$func])

mydata$func <- NULL
rm(fun); rm(func)
